Articles.Content:
Heyo everyone!

I am TheDarthMoogle, more commonly referred to as Moogle, \'cause Darth just sounds silly.

I\'m looking forward to getting more involved with the community here, even though modding and all the technical stuff ain\'t my strong point.

I love surfing, fajitas, cooking and yellow.

The smileys here stare into your soul o.O

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hi TheDarthMoogle and welcome to the community.

Don\'t forget to check out the forum rules while you\'re here, also I see by your avatar that The KSP Community My Little Pony Megathread may interest you, all pony related posts live there.

Have fun flying
